pr_title: Add thread names & mdc to log

timeline.bodyText: Could we add the block number and short hash to the log message? It could help when grep over the log lines. I'm not sure about the current format (there is a pull request that standardize the format)
timeline.author: ajlopezrsk

replies.bodyText: Added it directly as MDC keys to the whole block processing
replies.author: nicops

timeline.message:
Logging improvements

Added mdc & thread to log output.
Added mdc keys to BlockChainImpl (blockHash & blockHeight)
Added names to various threads
Added logging around BlockChainImpl calls to transactionPool

timeline.bodyText: Wouldn't be better if we wrap-up org.slf4j.MDC with an own implementation? Kind of helper or sthg?
timeline.author: patogallaiovlabs

timeline.bodyText: AFAIR, this is an auxiliary class, which its only real use is in regtest. Maybe we could add also the name of the thread to MinerServer, it has a thread
timeline.author: ajlopezrsk

replies.bodyText: Yes, but still, it's nice to have the logs in regtest. I didn't add the name to the MinerSever thread... because the name is already set: https://github.com/rsksmart/rskj/blob/master/rskj-core/src/main/java/co/rsk/mine/MinerServerImpl.java#L194
replies.author: nicops
